about.title: About
about.name: MattiaCode
about.introText1: I'm Mattia, a young technology enthusiast with an innate curiosity for the digital world. My passion for problem solving drives me to always seek out new challenges.
about.introText2: I'm currently building my educational path, aiming to transform my passion into a profession that allows me to express my creativity and analytical thinking through innovative and functional solutions.
about.introText3: I believe in the importance of clean code and best practices. Every project is an opportunity to learn something new and improve my technical skills.
about.job1Description: Leading web developering initiatives, building scalable design systems, and bridging the gap between design and development teams. Mentoring junior engineers and establishing best practices.
about.job2Description: Developed component libraries and design systems. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ship high-quality products. Improved developer experience through better tooling.
about.job3Description: Built responsive web applications using modern JavaScript frameworks. Worked closely with designers to implement pixel-perfect interfaces.
